1948: 1948 TV talent show "The Original Amateur Hour" hosted by Ted Mack premieres on the DuMont Television Network
1949: 1949 "They Stand Accused" courtroom drama premieres on CBS (later DuMont)
1974: 1974 "$6 Million Man" starring Lee Majors premieres on ABC TV
1975: 1975 "The Jeffersons" spinoff from "All in the Family" premieres on CBS
1987: 1987 3rd Soap Opera Digest Awards - Days of Our Lives wins
